job.description: stronguProjects The Candidate Will Be Working OnbrustrongulliProvide support for production AWS cloud environments for a state government customerbrliulstronguIdeal BackgroundbrustrongulliHealthcare is a plus but the ideal background is several years experience working in AWS supporting production workloadsbrliulstronguTeam And Team SizebrustrongulliCurrent team is 8 members with a mixture of people being on and offshore All the team members are DevOps engineers that are supporting the production environments brliulstronguTop ResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliWork closely with the product support teams to be able to troubleshoot production issuesliliBe able to deploy new releases or hotfixes to a Linux environmentliliAble to create new automation jobs to assist with common tasksliliBe able to manage an Oracle database so that new scripts can be run against it as well as perform adhoc queriesliliAbility to manage usersrole on AD Oracle Database Operating SystemliliAbility to triage infrastructure issues on ProdliliSupport all production services o EC2 EBS S3 EFS Cloudfront WAF ALB SecretsManagerCloudtrail Cloudwatch DynamoDb Redis SQS SES SNS IAM Inspector Gaurdduty Workspaces Certificate Manager DIrectory Services Lambda AWS Batch Step Function VPC SG NACL Disaster Recovery KMS OraclebrliulstronguSkillsattributes RequiredbrustrongulliLinux hands on comfortable with command line 3 yearsliliAWS management 3 yearsliliOracle 2 yearsbrliulstronguSkillsattributes PreferredbrustrongulliThe more experience with AWS setting up and managing services the betterbrliulstronguWorking TimebrustrongulliAbility to work night shifts would be idealbrliulstronguInterview ProcessbrustrongulliHow many rounds 2  1 technical 1 managerliliVideo phone or in person VideophoneliliHow technical will the interviews be Verybrliul
